items.sentence: My cousin isn't the kind of person who'd ever break a promise.
The distance from my house to yours is about three kilometers.
Tom always asks for Mary's permission before he does anything.
Most people who get infected with tuberculosis never get sick.
Are you sure you want to talk about this in front of our kids?
Do you think Tom would go to Boston with me if I asked him to?
The police are urging anyone with information to come forward.
I studied a lot harder for today's test than yesterday's test.
You can choose your friends, but you can't choose your family.
I used to never kiss Tom goodbye in the morning, but I do now.
